page.title: 13AGRICULTURAL ENGINEERING
page.content: The business of{Goughs }is more than 70 years old.They get their machinery from Coventry and Manchester.40 people work in all the depots.They normally sell more gas bottles in the winter for heating.They have always sold tractors.They sell things from welling tons to combined harvesters.They have a range of 10,000 parts.The highest priced item is Â£59,000.The lowest priced item is 1p washers.They deliver things.They have other shops in{Wether {by}and{Ripon.}Some of the building is 15 years old.The oldest tractor that they sell is 10 years old.They do not sell vintage tractors.They sell second hand ones but they are hard to sell. They sell sheep shears. {Jennifer Ellis}helps{Connings}milk delivery.They deliver milk to{Ribston, {Walshford,Hunsingore}and other villages.{Richard Ellis}is a joiner.{
